sentences.en: A close look at the statistics reveals a troubling picture.
sentences.cn: 仔细看过统计数据后，会发现情况令人担忧。

sentences.en: According to official statistics the disease killed over 500 people.
sentences.cn: 根据官方的统计数字，500多人死于这种疾病。

sentences.en: Although not essential, some prior knowledge of statistics is desirable.
sentences.cn: 统计学的知识虽非必要，但最好是学过一点。

sentences.en: It's not easy to disentangle the truth from the official statistics.
sentences.cn: 从官方统计资料中理出真实情况并不容易。

sentences.en: Official statistics show real wages declining by 24%.
sentences.cn: 官方统计数字表明实际工资下降了24%。

sentences.en: statistics for earnings by different age groups
Statistics is taught in many colleges.
sentences.cn: 许多大学都教授统计学.

sentences.en: Statistics on unemployment levels hardly make for scintillating reading.
sentences.cn: 失业统计数据读来不大会有趣味。

sentences.en: Statistics suggest that the population of this country will be double in ten years' time.
sentences.cn: 统计显示，这个国家人口在10年内将增加一倍。

sentences.en: The degree provides a thorough grounding in both mathematics and statistics.
sentences.cn: 该学位课程将为数学和统计学打下扎实的基础。

sentences.en: The organization publishes a regular digest of environmental statistics.
sentences.cn: 该组织定期出版一份环境统计数据摘要。
统计数据让人难以置信。

sentences.en: These sort of statistics are undoubtedly alarming.
sentences.cn: 这样的统计数据的确堪忧。

sentences.en: They have gathered the best statistics they can find and run them through their own computers.
sentences.cn: 他们已经尽力搜集了数据，并将它们输入了自己的计算机。
影响统计数字的准确性

sentences.en: We begin with a brief and necessarily incomplete review of UK statistics.
sentences.cn: 我们先简要地回顾一下英国的统计数字,当然还未全面.
我们有一项可喜的数据.

sentences.en: We have statistics for the last year.
sentences.cn: 我们有去年的统计资料.

phrases.tran_cn: 业务统计；商业统计学；经济状况统计
金融统计， 财政统计， 财务统计
统计学，医疗统计；医用统计学
概率论与数理统计；概率与统计
人口动态统计；生命的统计资料

trans.tran_cn: 统计数字，统计学，统计数字（statistic的复数）
trans.tran_en: quantitative data on any subject, esp data comparing the distribution of some quantity for different subclasses of the population
